attributes.action: keep alex salmonds in goverment dont let him stand down
attributes.additional_details: lets show some support to the man that gave it his all for scotlands freedom.. he done so much and gave us so much and got us so far lets return the favour and show we care.. lets make thuis go viral and show him we dont want him to go we want him to lead us to victory and that we are behind him all the way... standing down is not the way fighting the corrupt system is the way
